title: Textile, "Po-Ho", 1910–11
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: block printed on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Small, all-over pattern of fruits and leaves; (a) light blue, light green, yellow and ivory on dark brown; (b) purple, turquoise, puce, and red on ivory with black outlining.

1910–11. Medium: silk
